professional_details.about: Creative Full Stack Developer offering 4+ years of experience providing high-impact web solutions for diverse industry organizations. Skilled in designing, developing and testing multiple web-based applications incorporating a range of technologies. Proven ability in optimizing web functionality that improve data retrieval and workflow efficiencies. Aspiring to combine broad background with strong technical skills to excel as a Full-Stack Developer.

projects.title: Bajaj - Admin Services Revamp
description: Revamped a portal built on Angular to serve 30k+ employees
Improved user experience by making use of PWA to enable offline features and increase page load performance by 30%
Increased data query response time by 15% by restructuring API
Improved Security score by fixing vulnerability issues identified using Bug bounty and Checkmarx
Implemented many other security related features like SSO, JWT Tokens, Recaptcha and Analytics to name a few

projects.title: Bajaj - DAC
description: Responsible for full stack development of a disciplinary action committee Sharepoint site, now being used by Top level management in Bajaj Finserv
Developed Business Intelligence reports making Organization level employee behaviour analysis easier

projects.title: Neptune - Provisioning Tool
description: Implemented an effective Information Architecture across Neptune by developing an application that allows users to request and provision Sharepoint sites
Provisioned over 1800 existing sites with Record management features by using Powershell scripts

education.title: B.Tech in Mechanical Engineering
education.college: Sri Indu college of Engineering and Technology

awards.title: Microsoft Certified Power Platform Developer Associate
Named runner-up among 10 teams in the first ever Hackathon my company conducted - Hack Elite
Accepted multiple spot awards
awards.description: Received acknowledgement from clients on multiple occasions for the efforts invested in enhancing their products
